name: getAccountById
description: You can retrieve the details of a fire.com Account by its `ican`.

ican.description: The ican of the account to retrieve

$ul: **balance**: the balance of the account (in minor currency units - pence, cent etc. 434050 == 4,340.50 GBP for a GBP account).
**cbic**: the BIC of the account (provided if currency is EUR).
**ccan**: the Account Number of the account.
**ciban**: the IBAN of the account (provided if currency is EUR).
**cnsc**: the Sort Code of the account.
**code**: The three letter code for the currency - either `EUR` or `GBP`.
**defaultAccount**: true if this is the default account for this currency. This will be the account that general fees are taken from (as opposed to per-transaction fees).
**directDebitsAllowed**: Whether or not direct debits can be set up on this account.
**fopOnly**: Indicates that this account is for collecting Fire Open Payments only. All other payments to this account will be returned.
**ican**: identifier for the fire.com account (assigned by fire.com)
**name**: the name the user gives to the account to help them identify it.
**status**: Live accounts can be used as normal. Migrated accounts were used before Brexit and are read-only.
